content:
If you're composing private messages, with your cursor in the "To" input, the "Up arrow" keyboard shortcut doesn't work (i.e. the behavior is different than if keyboard focus is in the text area for the message body):

image.png

I think possibly the "Up should close compose and navigate in the message feed with an empty compose box" rule should apply if keyboard focus is in any of the compose inputs. Thoughts?

This detail is probably not super important, in that I don't think I've noticed this interaction before.
"Up" also does nothing from the stream and topic boxes in stream messages.
Hmm, yeah, I somehow lost the sentence where I'd noted that it wasn't exclusive to PMs. In any case, thoughts on whether we should change this?
Yeah, someone pressing up with focus on compose stream/pm/topic input box is mostly trying to navigate the messages if there are no typeaheads present. I will make the change.
